thread.title: BRIEF-J&J Gets $2.1 Bln Binding Offer For Its Lifescan Business From Platinum Equity

title: BRIEF-J&J Gets $2.1 Bln Binding Offer For Its Lifescan Business From Platinum Equity
text: March 16, 2018 / 11:49 AM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-J&J Gets $2.1 Bln Binding Offer For Its Lifescan Business From Platinum Equity Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 16 (Reuters) - Johnson & Johnson: * RECEIVED A BINDING OFFER FROM PLATINUM EQUITY, A LEADING PRIVATE INVESTMENT FIRM, TO ACQUIRE ITS LIFESCAN BUSINESS FOR APPROXIMATELY $2.1 BILLION * ‍ACCEPTANCE PERIOD FOR OFFER WILL END ON JUNE 15, 2018​ * ‍TRANSACTION WAS CONTEMPLATED IN COMPANY’S GUIDANCE PROVIDED ON JANUARY 23, 2018​ * ‍IF OFFER IS ACCEPTED, TRANSACTION WOULD BE EXPECTED TO CLOSE BY END OF 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
